action.description: From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended.Declared an emergency measure under the Constitution.Read third time. Amended. (Amend. No. 976.)Dispensed with reprinting.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved, as amended. (Yeas: 38, Nays: 4.)To printer.From printer. To reengrossment. Reengrossed. Second reprint.To Senate.In Senate.Assembly Amendment No. 976 concurred in.
